testimonials.text: Let me tell your something. I’m from Chicago. I don’t break.

Jimmy Breseman must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. You should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
